p: From Jan 2010 to Dec 2017, a total of 14,928 probable HFMD cases from Neijiang city were reported and recorded in the China Information System for Disease Control and Prevention ( http://www.chinacdc.cn). The data regarding the probable HFMD cases initially diagnosed in the seven hospitals involved in this study or confirmed in the laboratory at Neijiang CDC were extracted from the database, including demographic information, case definition (probable or confirmed), severity (mild or severe), date of onset, date of diagnosis at hospitals and virus serotype for confirmed cases.
